title: The Little Prince (Excerpt)
preview: Once when I was six years old I saw a magnificent picture in a book, called True Stories from Nature, about the primeval forest.
It was a picture of a boa constrictor in the act of swallowing an animal.

title: Don Quixote (Excerpt)
preview: In a village of La Mancha, the name of which I have no desire to call to mind, there lived not long since one of those gentlemen that keep a lance in the lance-rack, an old buckler, a lean hack, and a greyhound for coursing.
An olla of rather more beef than mutton, a salad on most nights, some lean chorizo, and a pigeon or so constituted his whole diet.

title: hangul
preview: 어느 맑은 날이에요. 숲속에 아기 토끼가 살아요. 아기 토끼는 배가 너무 고파요. "꼬르륵, 꼬르륵." 토끼가 말해요. "아, 배고파! 달콤한 딸기가 먹고 싶어."
토끼는 딸기를 찾아 떠나요. 깡충깡충, 토끼가 숲을 걸어요.
